characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist with pink helmet
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. Initially, the road ahead is clear. As the vehicle progresses, a motorcyclist with a pink helmet suddenly appears from the right side, moving into the vehicles path.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed initially. As the motorcyclist with a pink helmet suddenly appears from the right side, the vehicle needs to decelerate to avoid a potential collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A motorcyclist with a pink helmet, approximately 2 meters away, suddenly moving into the vehicles path.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving steadily in the same lane. The road is clear with no immediate obstacles or pedestrians.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, following the white sedan ahead at a safe distance. There are no sudden changes in speed or direction observed.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving steadily in the same lane. A black sedan from the adjacent left lane suddenly merges into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while observing the white sedan ahead. The black sedan from the left lane merges into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-vehicle to decelerate slightly to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Left: A black sedan, approximately 10 meters away, merging into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, pedestrians on the sidewalk
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving steadily in the same lane. There are pedestrians walking on the sidewalk on the right side. The traffic appears to be moderate with vehicles moving at a consistent speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, following the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the car in front and is staying in its lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Right side: Pedestrians walking on the sidewalk, approximately 5 meters away, not posing any immediate threat.
